title: A Red Sox Legend's Perspective on Opening Day
itunes:title: A Red Sox Legend's Perspective on Opening Day
description:
As the Miami Marlins Covid-19 news broke this morning Jason, Mike and Lynchie had an opportunity sit down with Legendary Red Sox broadcaster Joe Castiglione. Initially our interview was planned to be a reflection on opening weekend, we quickly pivoted and dove right into the headlines as they hit the wire. We chatted about the effect the positive test results will have on the season and what its like calling a game in an empty ballpark.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
